sentences: Michael Schermick (born October 21, 1958), known professionally as Michael Kelly Smith, is an American guitarist who played for the glam metal bands Cinderella and Britny Fox.
Schermick and drummer Tony Destra were fired from Cinderella in 1985 at the request of the record label, Polygram.
Schermick played on every album released by Britny Fox until their breakup in 1992.
He currently teaches guitar in Horsham, Pennsylvania.
